alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:21AM EST until January 11 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. Greatest accumulations will be across the higher terrain of the Boston Hills, western Wyoming County, and the higher terrain in northern Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. The lake effect snow band will lift north of the advisory area late this morning and early afternoon, but it will drop back southward late this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
